data.title: Stafford - Leicester
data.meta_description: This site is located near the Boutilier site on Stafford Rd in Leicester near the dense urban population of the city of Worcester providing load relief for the heavily congested area. This site was connected to the grid in March of 2018.
data.text:
This site is located near the Boutilier site on Stafford Rd in Leicester near the dense urban population of the city of Worcester providing load relief for the heavily congested area. This site was connected to the grid in March of 2018.

Environmental Benefits:

The project is estimated to save approximately 131 pounds of sulfur dioxide, 526 pounds of nitrous oxides, and over 700,000 pounds of carbon dioxide every year.

Specifications:

Size: 1000 kW DC

Powering 100 average US homes
